chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Yes, I am ready
awesome! i'm at the starting point
looks like there's a twig leading left to a small island with a tiger on it. which way to go?
You must take the path that has a twig that leads to a parrot.
got it! so, i'm heading left to the island with the tiger, then going south-west to the big island with the parrot, right?
Yes
okay, now i see an elephant to the left and a frog to the south-east of the parrot
where to next, mate?
Inside that island there is a big black rock, you must go there, then you must look for two smaller grey rocks, those rocks will take you to an island where there is a giraffe.

¡entiendo! Entonces, debo ir al sureste hasta las tres rocas que conducen a una nueva isla con la rana, luego mirar a la izquierda para ver el cocodrilo y el elefante, y luego al oeste hasta la jirafa.
¿bien?
Yes
sweet! now, from the giraffe i can see a snake to the southeast and some treasure two steps east of the snake
where to now, buddy?
Head towards the snake, then take the treasure. End.
Muy bien, vamos a la serpiente y luego al tesoro que es.
¡entiendo! *terminado* eres un guía fantástico, amigo.
hi there, empezamos?
Yes
¡genial! De hecho, ya estamos en el punto de partida, donde está el perro blanco. da unos pasos hacia la izquierda
Debería ver un banco de madera. ¿Puedes verlo?
yes
Well
Now go further west, crossing a path until you almost reach a flower stand. but don't get to the flower stand!
Okay,
cool, now make a u-turn to your left and cross the same path back
you should be heading back towards our furry friend
ok
cross over the path, head south, and keep walking down. you should soon see another white dog
this one's chilling by a red and white checkered picnic. let me know when you see it
ok
good stuff! now walk over the picnic mat, brush by a bowl of berries, and continue heading west
ok
great! you'll come across another wooden branch, go ahead and cross the river towards the north using it
ok
perfecto! now, see the green bush? do a little dance around it from the right side without touching it
the florist stand should be waiting for you at the end of your grooves. can you see it?
yes
¡impresionante! Ahora, gira a la izquierda y pasa por debajo de la tribuna.
Verás un gran puente con gente en bicicleta. dime cuando lo veas
yes
awesome! now, slide past the bridge to the west
just beyond, you should spot two old folks on a bench with newspapers, can you see them?
yes
great! now slip yourself a bit more, you'll need to go south between them and another wooden branch to reach a green bush
ok
¡bonita! ahora, dirígete hacia el este entre la rama y el arbusto.
ok
just a few steps further, my friend, and look! a young brown deer is right there
how cute is that? you did great!
yes
awesome! you made it through
well done!
ok
fun game, right? thanks for playing along with me!
hola, q tal? ready to go?
Yes
¡impresionante! Estoy parado al lado de la tienda, frente al perro y al fuego.
¿Qué camino debo tomar?
Walk south passing to the left side of the dog.
alright, i'm passing the dog on the left
now i'm by the fire, just in front of a red mushie. which way next, buddy?
Walk towards the blue car and then make a U-turn.
cool, walked up to the blue car and made that u-turn
now what?
Can you see the telescope? Walk towards the telescope
Entendido, estoy en el telescopio ahora.
¿Qué sigue en el camino?
Make a u-turn to the right until you see a hut, head towards that hut. End
giró a la derecha, en dirección a la cabaña
y. *finalizado*! ¡Lo logramos amigo!
hey, estas listo?
yes
super! let's start this journey. first, go southwest, under those proud palm trees, bending right after the second one
sharp left before you crash into the third one and head straight south. got it?
ok
great! now, see that cute, brown pup? head slightly left of him, but then swerve back right southwards
you're doing awesome!
ok
alright, now do you see those big and small rocks? navigate between them to reach the water
you're doing great!
ok
excellent, now you're at the water
do you see the grumpy red crab in there? turn right, follow the big rock and continue going west in the water
ok
perfect! after the third, medium rock, you'll face a shark
don't panic. crank a sharp right on spotting it!
ok
movimiento sólido! Ahora regresa a la tierra, apriétate entre la roca mediana y una bola tricolor, y continúa hacia el norte.
¿Estás bien?
ok
genial! now, you see that red tent and larger speaker? head a bit left and squeeze through them heading northwest
you're doing awesome!
ok
nice going! now, make a semi-circle around that same red tent and go back south
ok
fantastic! you're almost there
right before reaching the water turn right and go under that red kayak
ok
¡perfecto! ahora, gire un total de 90 grados a la derecha, paralelo al kayak.
